channel.title: Intimacy Coordinators on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Intimacy Coordinators on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘House of the Dragon’ Star Olivia Cooke Says Women Get ‘Labeled Difficult or a Bitch’ for Speaking Up About Sex Scene Boundaries: A Good Intimacy Coordinator ‘Will Become Your Voice’
item.description: “House of the Dragon” actor Olivia Cooke recently told The i Paper that women in the film and television industry are still labeled as difficult when they speak up about setting boundaries
